content: the shape of this shawl a square with one triangular section missing means it stays on your shoulders with the straight lower edge it also emphasizes your waist rather than pointing downwards please note - this is an adult sized pattern and my model is 4 years old - the estimated yardage is for the small size -- make the shawlette size with 2 100g balls of yarn or make a larger version with as many as you like as it s worked top-down you can adjust the size as you go work it in one colour or as many as you like
